title: Window Coverings, New Comfortable BBQ Pit Area, Jacuzzi
posting_body: ['Viridian is your ideal Las Vegas, Nevada destination for apartment home comfort in an unbeatable location.', 'Our studio, one, two, and three-bedroom apartment homes have something for everyone.', 'Our apartment homes feature fully equipped kitchens, open layouts, balcony or patio options, wood-style flooring, and views of the Las Vegas Strip.', "You'll find that your lifestyle is comfortable in the heart of it all at Viridian.", 'Call or chat with us to schedule your tour today.', '-Carpet', '-Jacuzzi', '-New Lighting and Plumbing Packages', '-Newly Painted Exteriors', '-Private Patio', '-New Stylish and Insulating Roofing', '-New Designer Interior Paint Colors', '-Refrigerator', '-Dishwasher', '-Range', '-On-Site Maintenance', '-Disposal', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Equal housing opportunity*']
